description: Suave is a simple web development F# library providing a lightweight web server and a set of combinators to manipulate route flow and task composition.
releaseNotes:
Release Notes:

 * releasing v1.0.0
 * [infra] e-mail off
 * Merge pull request #366 from matthid/razor_suggestions
 * fixup some smaller bugs which prevented the view localization to work properly.
 * Merge pull request #364 from matthid/razor_suggestions
 * support dot
 * use fun instead
 * fix syntax error.
 * remove viewPath variable.
 * add test for fallback behavior.
 * add fallback to homeDirectory
 * [docs] correct WebPart type signature
 * fix test and add one without file extension.
 * Use RazorEngine's internal caching; consider the current request path for resolving; reolve views in the 'Views' folder; Localize the view depending on the Accept-Language header; Add some helpers to read header values.
 * [docs] updates
 * remove duplicated link
 * [docs] syntax error
 * [docs] spacing/typo
 * [docs] update operator
 * [docs] json web service example
 * update operators
 * fix link, add chat link
 * update paket example
 * update homepage example
 * update hello world example
 * [docs] correct documentation comment
 * [libuv] ipv6 support
 * [classic] deprecating Types
 * [globals] https on suave.io
title: Suave
